info.title: Recorded Future V2
info.description: Recorded Future Connector enables access to the Recorded Future Intelligence. The connector has dedicated actions for pulling Recorded Future indicators (IP, Domain, URL, Hash) and associated context (Risk Score, Risk Rules, Intelligence Card Link and High Confidence Evidence Based Links), Vulnerabilities, Recorded Future Alerts and enables access to Recorded Future SOAR API and Fusion Files

evidenceString.description: Recorded Future Risk Rules Evidence Details
evidenceString.title: evidenceString

get.description: Enrich an IP with Recorded Future data

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP address to lookup. Must be a single IP address

parameters.name: IntelligenceCloud
parameters.description: Share correlations and enrichments data with the Recorded Future Intelligence Cloud. Default value: true

parameters.name: htmlresponse
parameters.description: Include a HTML template in the response

evidenceString.description: Recorded Future Risk Rules Evidence Details
evidenceString.title: evidenceString

get.description: List Alert Notifications by a set of search parameters

parameters.name: triggered
parameters.description: The timeframe for which to include triggered alerts. E.g. -24h or -2d

parameters.name: alertRule
parameters.description: Only return alerts triggered for the specified alert rule id.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of returned alerts.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Records from offset

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Field(s) to include, e.g. "id, hits". Returns all if not specified.

get.description: Get the alert details of a triggered alert

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Alert Notification ID

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Field(s) to include, e.g. "id, hits". Returns all if not specified.

parameters.name: freetext
parameters.description: Freetext search for Alert Rule Name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records

parameters.name: triggered
parameters.description: All Elasticsearch compatible date formats are valid.

parameters.name: alertRule
parameters.description: Alert Rule ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Records from offset

get.description: Deprecated, use /v2/alerts instead. List Alert Notifications by a set of search parameters
Deprecated, use /v2/alerts/{id} instead. Get the alert details of a triggered alert

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Alert Notification ID

post.description: List playbook alerts based on a set of search parameters

limit.description: Limit the number of playbook alerts returned
limit.title: Limit

items.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts containing this entity
items.title: Entity

items.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts with this status
items.title: Alert status

items.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts with this priority
items.title: Alert priority

items.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts with this category
items.title: Alert category

created_from_relative.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts created at most this many minutes, hours or days ago. Defaults to all time.
created_from_relative.title: Relative created from

created_until_relative.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts created at the latest this many minutes, hours or days ago. Defaults to '-0' (now).
created_until_relative.title: Relative created until

updated_from_relative.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts updated at most this many minutes, hours or days in the past. Defaults to '-1d' (one day back).
updated_from_relative.title: Relative updated from

updated_until_relative.description: Limit the response to playbook alerts updated at the latest this many minutes, hours or days in the past. Defaults to '-0' (now).
updated_until_relative.title: Relative updated until

get.description: Get the alert details of a playbook alert

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Playbook Alert ID

post.description: Get detection rules matching a search filter

types.description: List of detection rule types to include in the response

entities.description: List of entities that the detection rules must be related to

before.description: Limit the response to detection rules created before this date. Example: 2023-06-01T18:00:00Z

after.description: Limit the response to detection rules created after this date

limit.description: Limit the number of returned detection rules
limit.title: Limit

title.example: Snort Rules for CVE-2021-44228 Exploitation Attempts
